main.name: Yuhang Jin 金煜航
main.description: Passionate about learning technology and sharing knowledge.
main.bio: My name is Jin Yuhang, and I am currently pursuing my second year of Master's degree in Computer Science at the University of Southern California. I have a strong passion for learning new computer technologies and exploring innovative solutions. Apart from academics, I enjoy an active lifestyle. Tennis is one of my favorite sports, and I love spending time on the court honing my skills. Additionally, I find relaxation and enjoyment in playing video games, which also allows me to unwind and connect with friends. I am excited about the opportunities ahead and look forward to contributing my skills and knowledge to make a positive impact in the field of computer science.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: construct and code the game economy into the updates of the mobile free to play game ‘Monster Football’.

projects.title: Game Project
projects.description: A Game project based on Unity
